item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-12
item.description: Samsung’s CES 2021 robots will clean your house and pour you a glass of wine (6 minute read) Samsung unveiled three new robots at its virtual CES press conference on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-16
item.description: Facebook is having an end-of-year, company-wide meeting right now (Twitter Thread) This Twitter thread follows Facebook’s company-wide end-of-year meeting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-15
item.description: Amazonâ€™s new smart shopping cart lets you check out without a cashier (4 minute read) Amazon has a new smart grocery store cart that is equipped with a touchscreen and other hardware to automatically detect what items are being placed inside it.
